Berserk:



"I was sent to a war?" 

Berserk mused for a few seconds. It may have been a mistake or a 
plan. But he arrived here from the council anyhow. "This is the 
Predacon regiment, correct?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "No its not. This is pre-historic Earth. The same planet that our
> ancestors the Autobots and Decepticons faught the great wars on, 
and the
> Beast Wars took place. We're in another war. The Neo Beast Wars."
